website_summaries.verdict: A highly popular skin-quenching, age-reversing facial oil that's made with exceptional ingredients.
pros: Features marula oil and very pure nontoxic ingredients
A miracle worker for dry skin types, even works for eczema sufferers
Reduces fine lines and tones skin

customer_reviews.title: BEST FACIAL OIL!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Drunk Elephant and use them every day and my skin glows. I'm 46 and have no crows feet etc. Alot of that is thanks to Protini which has a growth factor. I was done with face oils until I tried DE Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil. I was absolutely amazed with how it disappeared in my skin and now I'll never go without it!! I'm so thankful to have found Amazon's Quiverr as they are the only place verified by DE so anyone wanting authentic DE products I only recommend Quiverr or DE site.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pursell

customer_reviews.title: Drunk Elephant Line Is The Best
customer_reviews.text: Since I started using Drunk Elephant products (about a month ago) my complexion has never looked better. If you think oil isn't for your face, think again. I used to think that way too because of adult acne. I've tried other oils, but this is far superior. I use this at night and when I wake up in the morning, my skin is glowing. Some of their products may seem a bit pricey, but the quality and results are enough to justify the price. I only wish I would've tried this line sooner. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I have ever written. This is complete FRAUD. The product I received was not the oil that i normally get , but in fact it was actually olive oil. When i opened the box, i thought it was weird that the package was open. After i washed my face , i went to use it and it was a completely different consistency and had an aroma that was none other than olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Nirk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I’m now using the TLC mask and this oil! It feels amazing on my skin without being greasy. My skin just soaks it up. I’m a new convert to the Drunk Elephant Line, thanks to my Uber trendy daughter-in-law. I think DE and I will be long time friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sailor

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are all true
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought endless amounts of high end luxury oils and serums. This one takes the cake. I’ve stopped using printers and multiplayer lotions and creams before makeup- to replace with this single product. Legit face wash, toner, vitamin c serum and now this oil before applying foundation. It’s added a whole life to my face (which is typically very dry) and keeps my makeup fresh all day. It is a cult follow item and deserves endless recognition. Say goodbye to primers and precursors to makeup. This oil is a true treasure.
customer_reviews.author: VPP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. I look 10 years younger ( well that ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I look 10 years younger ( well that is probably not true, but my skin definitely is softer and smoother )
customer_reviews.author: elsnyc

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This oil is so luxurious and moisturizing. My skin can be very dry at times, and I use this product nightly (with moisturizer) and my skin is so hydrated in the morning. No smell that I can detect and a few drops go a LONG way!
customer_reviews.author: Charles and Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Either outdated or faux product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is either outdated or not actually the product it says to be. Smell and color of product differ and the packaging is slightly different than the product Ive purchased from Sephora several times. I hoped ordering this from amazon would save me a trip to the mall but unfortunately not worth spending the same amount of money on junk product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley]

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like using an oil especially at night in the winter. I love this oil, it’s hard to explain, it’s an oil but it isn’t greasy. I use it morning and night. In the morning I put a little on all over my face an neck, let it soak in then put my moisturizer on, then makeup. I love it - my sling is must softer and smoother. In only a few days!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Goeller

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this oil
customer_reviews.text: This really is a game changing holy grail oil! I love everything about this oil! I have normal to dehydrated skin. I use this oil at night and in the morning with the Drunk Elephant serums, and it is like love to my skin! The whole Drunk Elephant line is simply amazing and will change your skin! This oil is so hydrating but its not overly heavy. It is a very light perfect oil!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Willis

customer_reviews.title: FAKE NOT AUTHENTIC DRUNK ELEPHANT
customer_reviews.text: FAKE FAKE FAKE FAKE FAKE. I’m a loyal drunk elephant customer and this is SO fake. Label is a shrunken down version of the real one. Will Never buy this product amazon again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy landsman

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: The winter is hard on my wifes skin along with the fact she is over 40 and is beginning to see signs of aging. She was going to move forward with a luxury department store brand of skincare but decided to try Drunk Elephant. She is very happy with it and may even ditch her makeup primer. There is no scent (in her opinion) and it absorbs great, feels like silk, without residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: My face was so dry from extreme cold weather that my skin was literally peeling. I used this upon recommendation from a friend and was thrilled that within 3 days, by skin returned to normal! I have acne prone skin, so also impressed that it absorbs nicely and doesn’t clog pores. I use it 2x a day under my normal routine. Worth the price. I’ve purchased this repeatedly at this point!
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Elle

customer_reviews.title: I like it! Pricey but I like it
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice moisturizer ! I actually developed some dry spots between my fingers due to washing my hands so often and I place this product on the spot and rubbed it in ONLY TWICE ! And not back to back and it completely made the dry spot go away! I switch between this moisturizer and another for my face routine and I really like it. You only need about 3-4 drops for your face and it won't feel overly oily and it won't feel like you need to apply more! I have only been using it for the past 2 months? I enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: TSK

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL GET THE GLOW AND LOOK YOU'VE ALWAYS WANTED
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews but I have been using this oil for over a month now and LOVE LOVE LOve it. I get suchhh dry skin during the winter and even summer months. I use face serum followed by this oil in the morning. At night I use Differin gel along with CerAVe face cream. I’d also like to mention that this gives me such a glow and I’ve never looked brighter and better. Definitely WORTH the money! I also have KP (Chicken skin) and it has significantly improved. ALL AMAZING BENEFITS TO THIS OIL!!!
customer_reviews.author: 3girls

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Hype
customer_reviews.text: I am the first to admit, I drank the koolaid. I saw all the rave reviews about "Drunk Elephant" and purchased everything. This oil is a waste of time. You can get good, if not better, moisture from a good quality rose hip oil for way less. I'm not too impressed with this skincare line. A few items are good, but I am not impressed with this oil or its price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this face oil. Velvety, rich, total luxury. This is an overall great line.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely follow up to the baby facial - well worth the splurge
customer_reviews.author: D Wright

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite fave oil!
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes without clogging pores or causing breakouts, evens skin texture & tone, gives face a natural flow, lightweight without feeling greasy. When you first apply, it looks oily but within a short time it absorbs into skin beautifully. It goes well under makeup!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth busch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this.. feels like its going to be greasy but soaks into the skin beautifully
customer_reviews.author: amanda b.

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry sensitive skin and have never found anything that has ever made my skin feel so hydrated and luxurious. this oil doesn't break me out or feel heavy on my face. I will definitely be buying this again and telling anyone interested how much I love this stuff. It was packaged pretty well. Double boxed and tightly sealed. I dont feel it could have leaked if it wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Pennypear

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: I love Drunk Elephant so much. After a bunch of research decided it was worth it to spend more for DE Marula oil. I have combo skin but the oil doesn’t make me break out and it’s transformed my skin along with protini and Hydra-B. The bottle is glass and I have butter fingers so that makes me a lil’ nervous but my guess is it’ll preserve better in glass?
customer_reviews.author: Cortez the Killer

customer_reviews.title: my facial oil came clumpy
customer_reviews.text: my oil was clumpy and looked congealed. unsure if it was suppose to come like this and I'm disappointed because reviews of this oil purchased not on amazon seems to be like regular oil. I've heard that Amazon has allowing the sales of products past expiry dates or dates of recommended uses. If i payed full price for this item on Amazon and received a less than par product i am very disappointed and will not recommend to my friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this oil. In the winter my skin is SO dry and flakey. After using this oil for 2 days, it was noticeably better. And I wake up with an incredible glow! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Patrico

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. It works beautifully for my mixed skin type and soaks in fast. It gives me nice glow and deep moisture. Just a few drops goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: allie marino

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this product. After 2-3 days of using both morning and night, I noticed a huge improvement to my overall complexion. My constant blotchiness is no more and my skin is so incredibly soft. My skin stays moisturized longer which makes my makeup look great even at the end of a long day. My skin looks so healthy and I have already received a few compliments on it! It was easy to convince my mom and my sister to purchase this product because they have seen such an improvement on my face. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Daw

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing oil
customer_reviews.text: Since turning 50 I have struggled with dry, flaky skin on my face. I've tried numerous daytime and nighttime creams and nothing helped with the flakiness or itching, until this face oil. It's amazing. You put it on and it is definitely an oil, but in no time at all it absorbs into your skin leaving your face soft and not greasy at all. My only objection would be the price. In my book it is extremely pricey. But it does it's job and a little goes a long way so I am hoping I only have to purchase it a few times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Purpleplum

customer_reviews.title: A couple of drops is all you need
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin feel amazing. Use at night. Too heavy for daytime use.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great things do come in small packages!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good oil-based skin moisturizer and decided to purchase Drunk Elephant. I have been using it everyday since I have purchased it and I have notice that my facial skin is less dull and flaky. This product is absorbed into your skin rapidly and there is no oily residue. I have even received comments from some of my colleagues that my skin is glowing. Some people may feel this item is expensive for the amount you get, but a little bit goes a long way. I will definitely be purchasing this facial oil again!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! The oil within the product is not Drunk Elephant’s Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil... This product has a distinct smell. It’s scent was more like olive oil. In the past, I’ve always ordered directly from Drunk Elephant or Sephora. I’m glad I smelled thIs product first. Who knows what reaction my face would have had since I have sensitive skin?
customer_reviews.author: Eriselda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Watery and didn't work-- DE user for 2
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of this product isn't the same as the product bougnt in store. Usually, I buy Drunken Elephant Marula Oil from Sephora but I couldn't this time (I've been using Drunken Elephant for 2.5 yrs). The consistency was watery compared to the ones I bought in store. It didn't help my skin. I won't be buying Drunken Elephany products, especially the Marula Oil, from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a couple drops and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial oil! I add 2-3 drops of it with one pump of the moisturizer at night and apply it to my face. I recommend adding it to a lotion so it’s not as directly oily when applying. It doesn’t cause my skin to breakout, it just keep it’s perfectly moisturized and healthy! Since you only use a couple drops a day it feels like it lasts forever. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelle Martin

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced size !
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil But wont buy it because the 0.5ml for $40 is just Not well priced vs 30ml for 72$.....
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: This product is a cult classic and I’m absolutely obsessed. It has no fragrance which I love and is ultra moisturizing. It doesn’t leave your skin feeling overly oily.
customer_reviews.author: Deeanna Hausske

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Drunk Elephant products. This oil has totally changed my skin. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DGoldberg

customer_reviews.title: Fast absorbing oil-based moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer. Absorbs quickly and does not leave an oily feeling. Fills in fine lines. Only need to apply once a day and does not clog pores. Feel it may be a little heavy for summertime use.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is, in essence, an overpriced marula oil in a fancy package. Please save your money and buy a regular marula oil, and you will get the same benefits for less.
customer_reviews.author: JvN

customer_reviews.title: My morning gift to myself!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? I didn’t love the idea of putting an oil on my face initially, but a friend told me I had to try this product and WHOA! I look forward to using it in the morning. It makes my face feel soft and I swear it makes me look better than I’ve looked in years. If I could afford it, I would purchase more of this line!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This oil has changed my skin care regime forever. I know it is pricey but the small bottle will last a while. You only need 4 drops a night. No scent. I notice my skin looks more even toned.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra Sapp

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR. ONEY
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I received feels like water. When I put this on, it feels exactly like pure water. i wrote the seller asking some questions, but no answer .
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kathryn Black

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are true!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing. It has helped treat the dry scaly patches on my face that I’ve been to the Dr about twice. I wondered at first if it was worth the money but it is everything and more.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Heaven
customer_reviews.text: this is the most amazing facial oil I have used. It doesn’t leave my skin shiny or too slippery, and it leaves my face so smooth. I bought this to use under my foundation but I find myself using it all day every day !
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: The best skincare
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have tried so many product lines. This one really works. It is costly but I am worth the investment. This is my go to product line. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Marek

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Beauty Item!
customer_reviews.text: All-purpose perfect! Moisturizers without being greasy. Have used it in cold, cold winters and humid Southern summers. Also, say goodbye to your facial primer. This handles the job beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have really sensitive skin and everything makes me break out, I was hesitant to use something with “oil” in the title, but this is different...I have stopped using all other products and I only use Drunk Elephant now, this moisturizer is amazing, wont make you break out, and will help clear your skin! Worth EVERY penny!
customer_reviews.author: ToyaJ

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is life changing. Wouldn’t know what I would do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn

customer_reviews.title: Pricy..
customer_reviews.text: This is not bad.. it feels great on my face after I shower and before I apply my makeup, but my skin feels dry mid day.. I use a few drops with my moisturizer under my foundation.. over all, it seems ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin! the best !!
customer_reviews.text: My skin can be very dry at times, and I use this product nightly and the day too !! I love use before the makeup !! it makes my skin very hydrated!!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Murari

customer_reviews.title: I mean, it's nice. Just WAY overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice on my dresser, but when it comes down to it it's just marula oil. Could get cheaper from another provider. I only use this sparingly, as it can move around actives underneath it if applied in the last step of a skincare routine. I might refill it with a generic marula oil after I use this up (if I ever manage to!)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this moisturizer! Best product I have ever used. I was very hesitant to use an oil on my already oily skin. This product is intended for all skin types. Love the way it leaves my skin feeling and glowing!
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Shauntel Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: This feels so nourishing to my 59 year old face! Just a few drops go a long way, and does not leave you feeling great at all. Love this stuff but wish it wasn’t so $$$😆
customer_reviews.author: B. M. Patt

customer_reviews.title: Favorite facial product
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and saw the difference in my face after applying this for a few days. It’s really small but don’t need to apply a lot so the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jime

customer_reviews.title: My face loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on my face at night. A little goes a long way. There is no sent. I like scent, but this way it wount clash with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole J.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This has to be my favorite face oil. It is on the expensive side, but I notice a difference if I use at night and sometimes like to mix it with my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Guess I expected too much!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading a few reviews on different Drunk Elephant products thinking it would be some kind of miracle product. Quite disappointed that I never saw a difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Drunk Elephant Marula oil, GREAT Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stuff!! Used one day and lines on my forehead are gone and my skin has never felt better! Will most definitely be buying again!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Skins happy
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Let it sit on your skin for a minute before you apply makeup. Absorbs better then straight vitamin E oil for instance and is a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Christine creedon

customer_reviews.title: Super Smooth Skin
customer_reviews.text: Been using for about a month and it has made my skin super smooth and extremely moisturized. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: GirlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without this facial oil.
customer_reviews.text: I have to have this oil at all times. My skin is dry and this oil is exactly what my skin needed. I’m super sensitive and I don’t break out at all. It’s exactly what my skin needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Huff

customer_reviews.title: Keeps
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. My skin is dry, especially in the winter and this oil changes everything. I plan to try the whole line !
customer_reviews.author: paulasara

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: My wife had allergic reaction when it was applied. But when we bought and used it from Sephora it was no problem. Why the refund is taking this long. Product was mailed over a week ago. Please refund and thank you 1Z7VY3859083188689
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Being a oil, serum base it doesn’t leave an oily film and absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have always had very dry skin and it’s drying out more as I age. This has made a tremendous improvement. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinagirl

customer_reviews.title: PRICEY
customer_reviews.text: What a tiny little bottle. I like it, but hope the bottle lasts for at least several months.
customer_reviews.author: ukulele lady

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: My 55-year-old face runs really dry. This oil is sensational to help my dryness.
customer_reviews.author: ALBA G

customer_reviews.title: olive oil
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS PURE OLIVE OIL , PLEASE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Best skincare brand I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best skincare brand I've ever used. This doesn't leave.my skin oily and I have naturally oily skin. My skin feels so much more balanced thanks to Drunk Elephant!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have severely dry skin. This is AMAZING. a little pricy, but we pay for quality! Will defiantly buy again. Cute packaging too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have used almost the entire product. didn’t notice any kind of improvement. I will not re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: I soo love this stuff my skin feels so soft and smooth i use it 3-4 times a week and loving it will buy lot bigger size next time
customer_reviews.author: Uyanga

customer_reviews.title: Just sat on my skin
customer_reviews.text: It just sat on my skin it made my face feel super dry
customer_reviews.author: TheAdaB

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product along with African Black soap and improved my skin 100% in the past 10 days of use. Not sure if the product needs safety sealed as my box was open when I received in within the Amazon envelop.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: A Little goes a Ling Way
customer_reviews.text: I will be honest I have oily skin and I cannot use anything oily. This product is oily. In good faith if your skin is oily and you pimples white heads a little goes a long way. It’s good for cuticles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Webster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I haven't broken out since using it. I'll for sure buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Tauriel

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: My skin was so dry & I have sensitive skin so this product didn’t clog my pores. Very light on my skin. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t get my oil
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get my oil I want to know what going one
customer_reviews.author: Inna Voroshan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The greatest! I’ve been using this and my face has cleared up and feels super soft!
customer_reviews.author: AZLands

customer_reviews.title: Light clean and perfect
customer_reviews.text: My skin soaks it up. It is light, doesn’t leave a smell, and doesn’t make me breakout. It’s amazing. I wish I knew about it sooner
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: I love applying this to my face on nights where I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love applying this to my face on nights where I feel a bit dry. It's a bit too oily for me to wear before applying makeup, but I have noticed a major difference with how my skin has been doing! It's probably not targeted for acne, but it has definitely help reduce some blemishes over night. And although the price is a bit outrageous, you only need the smallest amount to hydrate the entire face.
customer_reviews.author: Daysi

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Very small for its price but I can’t say much because I only had it for 2 weeks. Will update soon
customer_reviews.author: Zubayydah

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: It says use a tiny amount as it goes a long way & this is so true, also it oaks into skin immediately & isn’t greasy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy, Happy, Happy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! There was a noticeable difference in the softness and smoothness of my skin after using it one time. 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: My skin is actually looking and feeling a lot healthier. I love this oil
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like it so far. Love oils as a moisturizer and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Frank F.

customer_reviews.title: Not Fast
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product and did not see the results I wanted. There was no flaking and spots were not noticeably darker.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Alkema

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It really leaves your skin looking moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Alastar McGrath

customer_reviews.title: I love Drunk Elephant but this particular product was too thick ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Drunk Elephant but this particular product was too thick and greasy for my skin. Marula oil is great for those with dry and itchy skin but not for people with oily or combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: ERO

customer_reviews.title: Light for an oil
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of this oil. I was nervous about putting an oil on my face. I have been "plagued" with hormonal acne for several years and have finally got that balanced. So now I can move on and start addressing wrinkles/aging. But I am nervous because don't want to trigger more acne. I am happy to say this did not cause an acne attack. Unfortunately it is also too light of a moisturizer for my dry winter skin. I will keep it and try again once the humidity sets in around here.
customer_reviews.author: meredith m

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Oil
customer_reviews.text: Drunk Elephant is a very effective, simple, cutting edge skincare line. The Face Oil works great with all the Drunk Elephant face serums. The Face oil is absorbed quickly and provides great hydration for your face.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: ... of the Framboss Glycolic Night Serum and it's been fantastic. It's quite a thick oil and looks heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this on top of the Framboss Glycolic Night Serum and it's been fantastic. It's quite a thick oil and looks heavy once applied to the skin but you can see it really working into the skin cells. Loving these two products together.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't convinced about using oil on my face till I ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't convinced about using oil on my face till I started using this product (especially since I have oily skin). Still reserving real judgement till after I've used it for a few months, but really liking it as of right now!
customer_reviews.author: Riti Karnad

customer_reviews.title: This product is not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is not good for sensitive skin. The longer it was on, the more it burned. Even after washing my face, the burning continued for about half an hour.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this product.
customer_reviews.text: After reading and hearing how great this oil is, I had to try it. Not really a fan. For the price I had high expectations. After finding an organic marula oil on Amazon for a lot less money, I have found what works for my dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Baba

customer_reviews.title: Love! My face feels brand new!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this oil. I normally hate oil on my face, but this stuff absorbs pretty quickly! And you only need a drop or 2 for your entire face. After using this at night, I woke up the next day and my face had such a healthy feeling. I can’t even describe it. It felt so soft and supple. I’ll only use this twice a week since I don’t have extremely dry skin. But it’s well worth the investment. Just a tip to save you money...if you use the entire drunk elephant line, don’t waste your money on this! Every single product contains Marula Oil. So you’re getting the exact affect by using their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Irving

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. My sister told me about it and said ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My sister told me about it and said it was worth the money. Just a few drops make my skin feel fantastic and nourished. It looks healthier. I'm not going to say I look younger or less wrinkled. But I do look a more awake and rested version of me. Plus a very little goes a long way. I use it morning and night (and whenever I clean my face) and a container lasted 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100s of Bumps!!!
customer_reviews.text: Eventually broke out into hundreds of little bumps all over my face and hands. Rash? Zits? Not sure, but it looked as though every poor was clogged. It nearly sent me to the dermatologist thinking I had contracted something terrible before putting two-and-two together. Please, be careful! I thought it was great at first, but after a few months... disaster! The 30 day window is not enough time to give this product a thorough try. So, my first bottle poured $40 down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Richie&Mona

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hydration with No Alarming Side Effects
customer_reviews.text: I got several different moisturizing products at the same time for my dry, chapped, acne ridden face. This one stood out from the group and is my favorite. It doesn’t break me out and does hydrate really, really well. And...it doesn't have an overbearing scent! The only thing I don’t love is the price :-(
customer_reviews.author: vsajewel

customer_reviews.title: Virgin Marla Luxury Facial Oil is soothing and comfortable on my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I used my Virgin Marla Luxury Facial Oil on my face last night. I accidentally got some on my neck and that was good. Looking at my arms I dripped a small amount all over them also. It came out balanced with no dripping and immediately I was feeling great and peacefully fell asleep..This Drunk Elephant facial oil is amazing. I suggest trying this facial oil because I didn’t feel greasy when I put it on and couldn’t see it when I woke up. This is a luxury I can afford just because I’m worth i and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: It's okay - literally, just okay.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good product, but i don't find it to be magical like some of the other reviews write. Probably overpriced. Just being honest :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah D

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing and absorbs well into my skin.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It absorbs into the skin well and gives a fully hydrated and moisturized appearance and feeling on my face. It is a bit pricey, however that is to be expected from a high-end facial care product.
customer_reviews.author: Tatjana

product_meta.title: Drunk Elephant Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil - Vegan Anti-Aging Skin Care and Face Moisturizer - 15 Milliliters/0.5 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Size:0.5 Fl OzTHE DRUNK ELEPHANT DIFFERENCE
With a mission to deliver clinically-effective, clean skincare products formulated with both cutting-edge synthetic and natural ingredients, Drunk Elephant knows that every ingredient should directly benefit the health of your skin or the safety of the formulation.

VIRGIN MARULA LUXURY FACIAL OIL (30ml/1 fl oz)
Virgin Marula Oil is cold-pressed using a patented process of unheated water extraction, ensuring the oil remains nutrient-dense and stays fresher longer. Drunk Elephant doesnt cut, bleach or deodorize, nor do they add scented essential oils. Highly absorbable, Virgin Marula Oil delivers advanced defense against environmental stressors and free radicals.

NO FRAGRANCE
After carefully balancing the best ingredients available, Drunk Elephant doesnt have to add anything to mask their natural scents. When you smell their products, you will likely detect nothing but a glycerin base with slight hints of Marula oil, Zinc Oxide, Thermal Mud, Fruit Enzymes, and Vitamins for a refreshing and reassuring scent.

BREAK THE CYCLE
Your skin is left vulnerable with the overuse of harsh exfoliates, chemical peels, expensive laser treatments, Botox abuse, layered foundations and powders, and chemically-laden beauty creams. Theres nothing wrong with an occasional beneficial beauty splurge here and there (when appropriate), but it can be a vicious cycle that is hard to stop.

COMMITTED TO CLEAN
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only clean ingredients that either directly benefit the skins health, or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulas. Youll never find the Suspicious 6 (Essential Oils, Drying Alcohols, Silicones, Chemical Screens, Fragrances/Dyes and SLS) in their products.
feature_bullets: VIRGIN MARULA LUXURY FACIAL OIL. Straight from the pip of the marula fruit, Virgin Marula Oil is untouched by chemicals or fragrances. This luxurious oil reduces fine lines, wrinkles, redness, and blotchiness, while improving your skin's elasticity

REHAB FOR YOUR SKIN. This luxury facial oil is high in antioxidants tocopherol (vitamin E), tochotrienol, phenolic compounds and flavinoids, and rich in omegas 6 and 9, helps to moisturize, rejuvenate, and reset your skin

NO QUESTION IN QUALITY. A routine is only as good as its worst product, and a product is only as good as its worst ingredient. Drunk Elephant is dedicated to your internal health and external skin health; "If there's any DOUBT, it's OUT.

SENSITIVE VS. SENSITIZED. When skin is exposed to irritants and sensitizers, damage can be imperceptible and cumulative, leaving it in a reactive mode. "Sensitive" skin is often just skin that has become sensitized over time by harsh additives

MADE IN THE USA. Drunk Elephant doesnt take shortcuts or compromise ingredients to save money. They are hands-on and will stay true to their ethos. Their products are designed, tested, and made in the United States. Drunk Elephant is certified cruelty-free, they have never, nor will ever, animal test or allow products to be tested on animals.
